channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping, 2nd October
item.description:
More rubbish has now been dumped on this footpath

item.title: Gang tag graffiti on the glass and pavement by the bus shelter, 2nd October
item.description:
There are a number of different gang tags sprayed as graffiti on the glass of the bus shelter and on the pavement nearby - please can all be removed as a matter of priority before more appear as it’s intimidating using this bus shelter and unpleasant. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Lanes, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Graffiti / Flyposting on stop or shelter (non-offensive)

item.title: Overflowing bin and litter, 2nd October
item.description:
Litter needs cleaning

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mount Pleasant Lane, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple trees/bushes blocking pavement, 2nd October
item.description:
As per report ref: 8101487 which I raised early September which was then marked as fixed even though the problem had not been resolved. Multiple trees/bushes are blocking the pavement between 7a Victoria Road and the junction with Park Crescent. The overgrowth has been a regular occurence for years, they do not get pruned regularly enough. The blockage forces pedestrians to walk on the grass verge, which has caused the verge to turn to mud due to the footfall.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Victoria Road, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose /detached pole on frame, 2nd October
item.description:
The climbing frame in Whitehall has a displaced pole - it needs fixing as soon as possible. The frame came from Fawns and should be still under guarantees.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blenheim Road, Southborough, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Free males climbing on top of garage roof jumping up and down causing damage to roof tops., 2nd October
item.description:
Hackney Council need to open some communities halls for young people to do things instead a climbing on garage roofs.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Beanacre Close, Hackney, London

item.title: Dog poo bags, 2nd October
item.description:
A number of dog poo bags, small black bags, left next to the electric cabinet. Is it possible to clear them and put down dog stencils, to prevent future episodes. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Holmesdale Road, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: BT manhole not properly guarded corner of Gravel Hill (A220) and Broomfield Rd., 2nd October
item.description:
This damaged BT manhole on the grass verge corner of Gravel Hill and Broomfield Rd appears to have been poorly guarded since at least July 2025 as Google maps shows it with one plastic guard laying over it. There are currently two other additional guards presumably placed there since which have also been kicked over and are lying flat. These are difficult to see laying flat and a child could fall over them or even worse injure themselves by falling into the hole. Please raise this with BT(probably Openreach) to attend urgently and guard this correctly or even better, replace the lid. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gravel Hill, Bexley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hamilton Road SE27 a couple of yards from Gipsy R, 2nd October
item.description:
Hamilton Road SE27 a couple of yards from Gipsy Road junction – at the side of 227 Gipsy Road SE27 9QY yellow plastic Lambeth grit bin is tagged – Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for picture and Google Streetview link: https://www.google.com/maps/@51.4274584,-0.0875425,3a,60y,259.06h,73t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1sgdpWZoHeZKIYwJx7HE9lRA!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D16.997625271102095%26panoid%3DgdpWZoHeZKIYwJx7HE9lRA%26yaw%3D259.0619028997546!7i16384!8i8192?authuser=0&entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDkzMC4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D
